Html:
In the documentation an example is given of two conditions being applied to one cell. I am developing an app which requires on some cells that up to 5 conditional circumstances be checked for. The example has the lines:

array_push($conditionalStyles, $objConditional1);
array_push($conditionalStyles, $objConditional2);
so I am assuming I can add more than two conditional rulesets and just add each with the array_push() function, but I have not seen any documentation to this effect. Is that how that would be done?
Correct, it's how it should be done
